wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Anthony Botto (12 July 1898 – 4 June 1953), also written Louis Botto, was an English professional footballer who made 100 appearances in the Football League in the 1920s playing as a goalkeeper for Durham City, Wolverhampton Wanderers, Norwich City and Nelson. He also played non-league football for Jarrow Rangers, Hebburn Colliery, Shildon and Jarrow.
